titles.title: Emergency Management Assistance Compact Reauthorization Act of 2009
Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009
Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009
A bill to authorize appropriations for grants to the States participating in the Emergency Management Assistance Compact, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 111-103.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 223.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 7/14/2010--Passed Senate amended. Emergency Management Assistance Compact Grant Reauthorization Act of 2009 - Amends the Post-Katrina Emergency Management Reform Act of 2006 to authorize appropriations for Emergency Management Assistance Compact grants for FY2010-FY2012.
